strapiPost.title: In With the New
strapiPost.photoCredit: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiPost.content:
Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art has announced its 2022 temporary exhibit lineup, which will feature new exhibitions and revive old ones.

  • A few firsts: As part of the lineup, Crystal Bridges will be introducing its first fashion exhibition, called Fashioning America: Grit to Glamour. The exhibit will be dedicated to the impact of American fashion on the rest of the world.
  • Cultural Bridges: The Dirty South: Contemporary Art, Material Culture, and the Sonic Impulse is another exhibition that will highlight "the relevance and influence worldwide of American artists and designers of all backgrounds."
  • North Forest Lights: And the fan favorite, The North Forest Lights will also be returning this fall, guiding visitors through light and sound installations in the North Forest at the museum. See the teaser HERE.

If you'd like to know more about the exhibits coming to Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art in 2022, click HERE.
